choices.B: Collect data to identify the problem and apply it a Workspace ONE UEM update.
choices.D: Gather information to try to reproduce the issue, then collect the data to diagnose the problem and apply a fix.
choices.A: Verify device connectivity and logon to the Workspace ONE UEM console.
choices.C: Check the FQDN of the enrollment URL and try to connect to it through a Web browser.

questions.question_text: Which steps should be used to troubleshoot most issues in a Workspace ONE environment?
Which hierarchical level allows the administrator to add an admin repository of the type Network Share (SAML)?

choices.B: Verify the keys values are not case-sensitive.
choices.D: Check the ENS connectivity to the Workspace ONE UEM Console.
choices.C: Verify that the device is running the latest iOS version.
choices.E: Verify VMware Boxer configuration key-value pair parameters.

questions.question_text:
Sometimes devices are unable to receive notifications from the Email Notification Services (ENS) server.
Which two troubleshooting steps should be taken? (Choose two.)

comments.content: "You may use the Workspace One validation tool to verify that your instance of the ENS is properly configured"
From the Exam prep about ENS, it's D, E

choices.C: The Store for Business assets need to be configured at the same OG as the Azure AD services.
choices.D: The Active Directory Federation Services (ADFS) connection to Microsoft Azure Active Directory is broken.
choices.B: The Workspace ONE UEM license of the Microsoft Store for Business is missing.
choices.A: A Workspace ONE Enterprise Licensing is required.

questions.question_text:
An administrator has configured the Azure Active Directory configuration successfully. The Microsoft Store for Business Applications does not work.
What is most likely the cause?

discussion.content:
When there are multiple Exchange server versions but all the
Exchange servers have the same domain, ENS server is unable to
complete all the subscriptions correctly
ENS server functionality is interrupted when multiple Exchange server versions are configured with the
same domain. You can either create separate domains for different Exchange server versions or install
separate instances of ENS that are specific to each domain.

Correct answer :AD

choices.C: The ENS server is able to complete all the subscriptions correctly.
choices.E: Each Exchange server needs to have at least one Apple Push Notification Service (APNS) Certificate.
choices.A: All of the Exchange Servers need to be updated to the same version of Windows Server.
choices.B: An administrator needs to install separate instances of Email Notification Services (ENS).
choices.D: The ENS server functionality is interrupted.

questions.question_text: Which two statements are true about multiple Exchange Server versions in the same e-mail domain? (Choose two.)
